ota.summary:
## What's Changed
* Media player task blocking and memory tweaks by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/72
* Build firmware with ESPHome dev branch by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/73
* Initial mWW and VA intercomponent communication by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/61
* [media_player] Add mute, unmute and volume change triggers by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/75
* [media_player] mute, unmute, volume triggers after updating state by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/76
* New animation for Jack and Silent mode by @jlpouffier in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/74
* [i2s_audio] Rebase with ESPHome to prepare for merging by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/77
* Set yaml to reference dev branch by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/78
* [micro_wake_word] Bugfix: New spectrogram features should go to the back of the queue by @kahrendt in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/79
* A couple quick tweaks to maintain IDF 5 compat by @kbx81 in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/80
* Fix update manifest source by @jesserockz in https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/pull/81


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/esphome/voice-kit/compare/24.9.1...24.9.2
